archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.3e: e) implementing methods to help identify individuals who have been placed in the organisation to perform unauthorised activities (e.g. developing an insider threat programme, establishing an insider threat team and monitoring the behaviour of people).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
